title: Interpretation of the Quran (English & Arabic)
description:
Book Title: Tafsir Ibn Kathir (English & Arabic)

Interpretation of the Quran by Ibn Kathir. This is recognized as the most accurate interpretation of the Quran. Contains the Arabic text of the Quran and underneath each verse it has the English translation of the verse, followed by an explanation of the verse in English. Contains the interpretation of EVERY single verse in the Quran.

Very useful for those who can read the Quran in Arabic and want to know what the verses mean in English and the story behind the verse where applicable.

Note: You don't need to know Arabic to understand this book.

If the file doesn't show any text, go to file properties and click "Unblock".
